guarantee2: 12 month warranty for technical errors and water plating.
guarantee3: For oxidized and discolored products, they will be ultrasonically cleaned with a specialized machine (ultrasonic, no plating) for free for life at the store.
guarantee4: Free polishing for lifetime. Wedding rings will be warranted, renewed, polished, and plated for free for lifetime.
guarantee5: Free replacement of CZ and synthetic gemstones
guarantee6: Warranty does not apply in the following cases:
guarantee7: Broken, deformed or severely damaged necklace or bracelet
guarantee8: Customer provided incorrect invoice retrieval information.
guarantee10: ES warrants products in the ES online store system.
guarantee11: Product warranty may change according to ES's policy for product lines and promotions at each time.

searchGIAcertification1: Diamonds sold by Diamond World always have full international certification certificates. You can look up the authenticity of the certification certificate on GIA's website

ringSizeInstructions1: Step 1: Choose a ring with a similar width and style to the design you intend to buy.
ringSizeInstructions2: Step 2: Use a ruler to measure the inside diameter of the ring
ringSizeInstructions3: Step 3: Compare with the Ring Size Reference Table.
ringSizeInstructions4: Step 4: Adjust Ring size before ordering online.
note1: You should not use string or paper to measure your hand size because the results may not be accurate.
note2: For rings with thick, wide designs, you should add 0.15mm-0.6mm to ensure the ring fits comfortably.
note3: Nếu đang phân vân giữa 2 size nhẫn, Quý Khách nên chọn size tay có kích thước lớn hơn.
note4: The ring size reference table below is for reference only. You should go to the ETERNAL SPARKLE store system to have your hand size checked for the most accurate fit.
note5: Please pay additional fees for making new molds, processing and manufacturing when the wrist size exceeds the STANDARD SIZE (Women from size 15 and up and Men from size 20.5 and up).
about1: Established in 2024, Eternal Sparkle is a prestigious diamond store in Ho Chi Minh. We are proud to bring exquisite, unique and high-quality diamond products to customers. With the goal of creating a great shopping experience, Eternal Sparkle constantly strives to meet all the needs and desires of customers.
